about_the_game:
A demo of Pixel Petkeeper: an autobattle. pet-collecting. casual indie game

ENTER DUNGEONS & AUTOBATTLE


Select the path you want to take in a dungeon by choosing which room to enter. Some rooms have obstacles, treasure, travelling merchants, fields, and more.
In battle rooms, fight creatures using an autobattling system or use your pets skills in real time.

TRAIN & SPECIALIZE PETS


Use the training room to increase your pets' stat points. You can also use the clinic to recover their HP if they are injured.
Use the Laboratory to freeze or merge pets. Create artifacts from pets' skills and use them to enhance your favorite ones!

COLLECT & CRAFT


Collect crafting materials from monster drops then purchase a workbench to create items like nets.
Use cooking fixtures to create boosting food items or special merge items.

DEMO INFORMATION


For the demo, unlock up to the second map area (3rd arc) with all playable features & systems unlocked and usable
